snippet: Overhauling the city’s building permit system to make it more transparent is just one Prithviraj Chavan’s changes.
abstract: Overhauling the city’s building permit system to make it more transparent is just one Prithviraj Chavan’s changes.
lead_paragraph: MUMBAI, Maharashtra — “The units in an apartment building being built in the upscale Mumbai neighborhood of Juhu promised to be both dazzling and odd: Each of the 33 homes in the 11-story building would come with a private lily pond, a car elevator and parking spaces for three cars next to the living room,” Vikas Bajaj wrote in The New York Times.

headline.main: Indian Official Starts Pulling Up Corruption’s Roots in Mumbai
